summary: Every camper's worst nightmare came true at Lake Bodom in 1960 when four teenagers were stabbed to death while sleeping in their tent.
cast: Nelly Hirst-Gee|Mimosa Willamo|Mikael Gabriel|Santeri Helinheimo Mäntylä|Pirjo Lankinen|Ilkka Heiskanen|Sami Eerola|Otso Ahosola|Ville Saksela|Iiris Kankkunen|Tommi Korpela|Jarkko Niemi
title: Lake Bodom
